title: Rework the only .doc file into .md
body:
Fixes #6095

### Context
As stated on the issue, there is a lone `.doc` file marked as confidential. As per comment from @marcpopMSFT there was no problem on removing the notice and leaving as is. Converted it to `.md` to be readable on repo and standardized

### Changes Made
* rewrote `.doc` file into `.md`
* removed confidential notice

### Testing
None required. Documentation changes

### Notes
None

commit.message:
Update src/Shared/SharedCode.md

Fix typo

Co-authored-by: Rainer Sigwald <raines@microsoft.com>

+
+## **Namespace**
+All sahred code _must_ live in `Microsoft.Build.Shared` namespace.
